description:
Misaki, Tamayo, Hatako and Kotaro go to the beach. The Angelic Layer development team also ends up at the same beach. Someone confesses their feelings, but will those feelings be returned?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: La mer en été ! Quelqu`un est amoureux de quelqu`un.
Natsu no umi! Dareka ga dareka ni koi shiteru
O Verão Na Praia! Quem Está Apaixonado Por Quem?!
Sonne, Sand und Meer! Jemand hat sich verliebt
The Summer Sea! Someone is in Love with Someone
夏の海! 誰かが誰かに恋してる
